text:
No branded hotpot or premium meat and seafood but we agree unanimously that nothing beats this comforting and back to basics steamboat.
What we like best is the fresh ingredients and simple, old-fashioned chicken broth and soy beans base that gets more flavourful as we add the ingredients in the soup. We skipped the set and ordered individual plates of ingredients including sliced fish, beef, fish dumplings, cockles and vegetables.
Sadly, they are no longer serving zi char dishes [yes! I miss the ‚Äòpong pong‚Äô prawn fritters] but there‚Äôs still the old school steamboat that we can enjoy and appreciate.

I have been patronizing Ah Pang Steamboat for almost 10 years and i can proudly say that their steamboat is by the far one of the best and has the most nostalgic taste.

Their ingredients that they serve is super fresh be it Meat, Seafood or vegetable.

If you are looking for a steamboat place that brings you back to the old times filled with nostalgic taste, please visit Ah Pang Steamboat!

My family always come to Ah Pang Steamboat. It offers an exceptional dining experience with its flavorful and wholesome soup. The absence of MSG ensures a clean, natural taste that enhances the quality of the ingredients. The food is fresh and well-prepared, making each bite delightful. If you're looking for a satisfying and healthy steamboat meal. I super like üå∂Ô∏è freshly made by them Ah Pang seafood definitely my first choice for steamboat . Highly recommended üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

The selection of fresh ingredients was impressive, and the broth options were flavourful. The service was friendly and efficient, and the casual atmosphere made for a relaxed dining experience. My only minor gripe was that the wait times for refills could be a bit long during peak hours. Overall, a solid choice for a tasty and enjoyable steamboat meal!

A comforting steamboat meal with fresh ingredients and a simple yet flavourful broth. My family and I ordered the 3 pax steamboat set with 3 bowls of rice which totaled up to $52 (vegetables and 2 eggs were indicated as FOC).

They provided a homemade chilli sauce (very spicy but tasty), along with soya sauce and garlic for dipping. Additionally, a WHOLE box of tissues were provided which we appreciated.

In terms of the location, the open-air hawker setting had great ventilation with fans and high ceilings, making it comfortable to eat.

Will definitely be back!
